document.docAuthor: Vivallo, Felipe, Vélez, Danny & Fernández, Fernando
document.masterDocTitle: Two new species of Centris (Aphemisia) Ayala, 2002 from Colombia with a synopsis of the subgenus for the country (Hymenoptera: Apidae: Centridini)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Two new species of Centris (Aphemisia) Ayala, 2002 from Colombia with a synopsis of the subgenus for the country (Hymenoptera: Apidae: Centridini)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Centris fusciventris Mocsáry, 1899 : 252
(synonymized by Moure et al ., 2007 ).

Type material.
Centris quadrimaculata
: Holotype female (Museum of Comparative Zoology, MCZ, Harvard University, Massachusetts, United States , examined).
Centris fusciventris
: Lectotype female (Hungarian Natural History Museum, HNHM, Budapest, Hungary , examined).

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 11−14.
Centris quadrimaculata
Packard, 1869
. Fig. 11. Female: Head, frontal view (scale bar 5.6 mm). Fig. 12. Habitus, lateral view (scale bar 5.9 mm). Fig. 13. Male: Head, frontal view (scale bar 5.5 mm). Fig. 14. Habitus, lateral view (scale bar 6.2 mm).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type localities.
Centris quadrimaculata
: PERU : Loreto.
Centris fusciventris
: BRAZIL : Piauí.

Floral records.
Passiflora edulis Sims,
P .
maliformis L.,
P . ligularis Juss.
( Passifloraceae ),
Psidium guajava
L. (Myrthaceae), Solanaceae and Melastomataceae .
